scripts.migrate:reset: echo 'WARNING: This will destroy all data!' && read -p 'Continue? (y/N) ' confirm && [[ $confirm == [yY] ]] && psql "$PATTERN_DB_URL" -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && npm run migrate
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run mcp:start" --names "WEB,MCP" --prefix name --kill-others
